GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
thermal/drivers/broadcom: Fix potential NULL dereference in sr_thermal_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit ef1235c6514a58f274246cf4a2d5f4e40af539ce, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 250e211057c7237dc75634b1372a1a3bd58dcd96. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: thermal/drivers/broadcom: Fix potential NULL dereference in sr_thermal_probe
